__e: Oh, come on, son, if your girlfriend went to this much trouble to meet me, I think she deserves a little face time with the King of Country!
Well, you love getting out your big brain, and... and I just thought it'd be cool to spend some... quality time with you.
It's nice to know that at least one of my sons isn't too busy to spend a little time with the old man.
You have the time to put up an act in front of this world... and the Almighty, forwhom this world is an act... you don't have even little time for him?
It was... it was a place to go where I could just shut out the rest of the world and find a little square bit of time and peace for me, just a little bit.
And before he sits, he wants to know if you have a second to chat with him.
